name: Essential Negotiation Skills for Women
content: This event is hosted by 3 women lawyers - the CEO of a mining company, a former GC of a technology company, and a partner at a leading Canadian law firm. These senior women will provide first-hand experience on how to up your game in business and in life. This interactive seminar will give you hands-on experience, coaching and tips in a safe, learning environment that will help you to be more effective at negotiating - whether it be closing a business transaction, navigating issues in the workplace or negotiating your own salary. Build your skills and unleash your full potential! Hurry - space is limited! Price: Essential Negotiation Skills for Women in Business: CAD 349.0 Time: 9:00 am - 12:00 pm Venue details: The St. Regis Hotel Toronto.,325 Bay Street,Toronto, M5H 4G3,Canada
organizers: Deal Shoes / St. Regis Hotel Toronto
